actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to permit the District of Columbia Government to recover by set-off against retirement funds, the amounts due from former employees.

summary.text: Authorizes the District of Columbia government to recover by set-off against retirement funds, the amounts due from former employee debtors. Provides that for tax indebtedness purposes the set-off shall not be permitted unless the tax indebtedness has first been reduced to judgment by a court. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8346)

titles.title: A bill to permit the District of Columbia Government to recover by set-off against retirement funds, the amounts due from former employees.
